participant_1.background:
I'll help others by recommending my favorite shows on Netflix.
I would love to be reincarnated as a chef, so I can continue to share my love of food with others.
After a long day of designing and testing new environmental technologies, I relax by going for a run in my blue shoes.
Last year, I painted a portrait of my two small dogs.
i am seventy one years old.

participant_2.background:
I work hard to provide for my family.
I am grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility.
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
I am looking for a new challenge, as I have already accomplished everything I wanted to with my family business.
I am a busy person who enjoys my downtime on weekends.

content.text: Hey there! Not much, just relaxing.
I'm doing well! I just got back from painting a portrait of my two small dogs.
That's awesome! I bet they love it.
Yeah, they do. I'm a big fan of painting, and I love dogs, so it was a perfect project for me.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go for runs, I'm a bit of a health nut. I also love to cook, and I'm always trying new recipes.
Those are both great hobbies! I love to cook too, but I'm not very good at it.
You should give it a try! It's really fun, and you can learn a lot.
I might just do that! Thanks for the advice.
No problem! What do you do for work?
I'm a business owner, I run a small family business.
That's awesome! I'm sure it's a lot of work, but it's probably also very rewarding.
It is, it's a lot of work, but it's also very enjoyable. I get to meet a lot of interesting people, and I get to be my own boss.
That sounds great! I'm glad you enjoy it
